headline: IPG Health Introduces the Future of Market Research with ‘LivingMirror,’ an Always-On AI Focus Group for Healthcare
summary: Expanding network’s proprietary EPICC suite of tools for secure, AI-powered replicas of both HCPs and patientsNEW YORK, Aug. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- For decades, market research has laid the foundation for deep insights around the globe helping brands connect, understand and grow. Now with the ability to combine agentic AI with robust data-driven audience understanding, IPG Health is redefining that foundation to unlock entirely new possibilities. headline: CRAI International's Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates in Q2
summary: CRAI posts a 9% revenue jump and raises 2025 guidance as Q2 EPS and EBITDA margin both improve year over year.
